alert.note: Alert for Faulk (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:19PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Faulk County through 845 PM CDT... At 819 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Evergreen Colony, or 7 miles northeast of Faulkton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cresbard around 830 PM CDT. Devoe around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Chelsea, South Scatterwood Lake and North Scatterwood Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central South Dakota.
